name: Zariel
resistance: cold, fire, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede Zariel's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Zariel's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 36 (8d8) fire damage (included in the weapon attacks below).

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Zariel's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 26). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing her appearance), detect evil and good, fireball, invisibility (self only), wall of fire * 3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, finger of death

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Zariel fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Zariel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Zariel regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Zariel dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
